Preconditions: User has an active online banking account with a registered email; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Go to the online banking login page. 2. Click Forgot Password. 3. Enter the registered username or account number. 4. Submit and request a password reset link to the registered email. 5. Open the email
Expected Result: click the reset link. 6. On the reset page
column6: enter a new password meeting policy and confirm. 7. Submit. 8. Return to login page and sign in with the new password. 9. Verify the dashboard loads.
column7: Reset email received; reset link is valid; new password accepted; login successful and dashboard displayed

Preconditions: User has no account or registered email
Test Steps: 1. Go to the online banking login page. 2. Click Forgot Password. 3. Enter an unregistered username or email. 4. Submit.
Expected Result: System displays an error message No account found and no reset email sent

Preconditions: User has an active account with a registered email; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Initiate password reset. 2. Open the reset email and click the link after expiry. 3. Attempt to use the expired link.
Expected Result: Reset link has expired; user is prompted to request a new reset

Preconditions: User has an active online banking account with registered email; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Initiate password reset. 2. Click the reset link. 3. Enter a password that does not meet complexity rules. 4. Attempt to submit.
Expected Result: System displays a password policy violation message and prompts to enter a valid password

Test Case Name: Reset Password - Passwords do not match
Preconditions: User has an active online banking account with registered email; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Initiate password reset. 2. Click reset link. 3. Enter new password. 4. Confirm password does not match. 5. Submit.
Expected Result: System shows mismatch error and allows correction

Preconditions: User has an account with registered email; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Initiate password reset 5 times quickly from the same device/IP within 10 minutes. 2. Observe CAPTCHA or temporary block after threshold.
Expected Result: System enforces rate limit and requires a CAPTCHA or blocks further requests for a period

Preconditions: Account has been locked due to suspicious activity; user is unable to reset password
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to Forgot Password. 2. Enter username. 3. Attempt to reset password. 4. System denies and instructs contacting support.
Expected Result: Password reset is not allowed for locked accounts; user advised to contact support

Preconditions: Account supports security questions option; user is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to Forgot Password. 2. Choose Security Questions option. 3. Answer security questions correctly. 4. Set new password meeting policy. 5. Sign in with new password.
Expected Result: Password reset completes; user can sign in with new password
